website_summaries.verdict: The budget-priced JVC HA-MR77X headphone pair delivers deep bass paired with highly tweaked, sometimes harsh mids and highs.
pros: Distortion-free audio performance with strong bass response
Inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Headphones can be uncomfortable over long listening periods
Inline remote control is limited and doesn't control volume

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today. I'm listening to some awesome "Yellowcard" right now. I just love these headphones. They fit over my ears very nicely. I think they're very light weight and comfortable. They sound is just fantastic. The music sounds rich and full. I get great bass tones which I love. I can wear these for extended listening as they don't pinch my head. They look really cool too. I can't speak for the phone function. I got them for my laptop which has the crappiest speakers you could ever almost hear when turned up full. I'd say grab a pair before it's to late.
customer_reviews.author: Road Tripper

customer_reviews.title: WOW from a 30 year high end guy
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Better than good considering the price. I also own jvc ha sz1000s and these are much better. Clean at insane volume with way better bass. Better than the 1000s at any volume level. Put a fiio e12 on these and you won't find a better headphone that can do what these can, period. If you listen to demanding classical these will also do a good job of reproducing full orchestral works while still having nuance. Jazz? They can do that too. Closed back design so buy these AND some sennheissers or hifiman planars if you want it all. Bang for the buck champs!
customer_reviews.author: ducatirob

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to buy an headphone amp!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I just got these today they sounds pretty good. The clarity is better than my beat mixrs and the headphones Seperates the bass nicely meaning they aren't too muddy. The bass is just ok my beats mixr do better in this category (using galaxy s3 as mp3 source). But that's with out a headphone amp I think these definitely need one to bring out the full bass potential because the impedance is fairly high to medium (46 ohm). You can pick a cheap one up on amazon for $27.99 it's called a fiio e6. Fairly good for the price and will bring the quailty of bass and sound up.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: MSRP 100$ Bass cannon.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap. If you want some thunderous bass in your ear holes you have found the correct headphone. I've paired these babies up with this.  The headphones out of the box only distort once you get to about 80% on the amp. That was too loud even for my hard of hearing ear. These things pound.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I got these because a friend showed a lower model to me and I thought they were cool, up till then I was convinced beats were the way to go for a music junky such as myself but they cost way too much some almost 500$ and not even this jvc model size, I Looked Around And Found These For Almost 99$ I Was Shocked But Then I Thought They Must Not Be very good how wrong was I, Not only R They cheap But very Comfortable and sound amazing. I showed a friend at school who likes beats and he admitted they were possibly better than beats, I recommend this to all My fellow metal/techno/Rap listners
customer_reviews.author: Rouge121

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice bass as I wanted it for , the headphones are not heavy but are bulky. But it had a nice sound quality . make sure to keep the headphones on setting a for best music.no damage on the headphones during shipping
customer_reviews.author: vladimir grooms

customer_reviews.title: Not so Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted way better sound. I bought JVC HAFX1X Headphone Xtreme-Xplosivs, which are awesome and I really loved them. I wanted some headphones with great sound, so I wanted to go bigger than the JVC HAFX1X Headphone Xtreme-Xplosivs, so I went ahead and bought these. I was expecting a lot, specially heavy bass, and I got disappointed. I mean they sound good but not what I was expecting and I sometimes feels the JVC HAFX1X Headphone Xtreme-Xplosivs deliver better sound and bass. 6/10
customer_reviews.author: Fernie Madrid

customer_reviews.title: good as expected
customer_reviews.text: this JVC HAMR77X Headphones (Old Version) was excellent as I thought even though its old version but I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Ali Alqallaf

customer_reviews.title: Really big... but folds... ...
customer_reviews.text: Really big. . .but folds. . .used on airplane and cross county road trip. . Eggcellent.
customer_reviews.author: happy buyer,

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but the problem is warranty because i bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but the problem is warranty because i bought it from usa and i live in Australia so warranty is only valid in usa not in any other country, except from that everything is good and i love jvc products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attention Bassheads
customer_reviews.text: BASSHEADS! These things are for you. Ive owned Beats pros and they only produce half the bass of the Mr. 77x
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headphones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! Someone else introduced me to them. Recommend to others. Perfect sound.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better then my beats that i spend $300 these cost me 40 dollors and sound way bettef
customer_reviews.author: emery

customer_reviews.text: Were beyond my expectations despit them being very high. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Issac Alejandro Izaguirre

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cord is crappie and stopped working after one week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didn't sound as good to me as Sony's XB line
customer_reviews.text: These are DJ headphones, which mostly means the bass is there for beat detection for mixing songs. It didn't sound as good to me as Sony's XB line. The mids and highs were a bit recessed as well. The pads were uncomfortable and the headphones clamped a bit too tight for me, but I have a pretty big head. I would rather recommend the Sony XB800 if you are looking for quality bass headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Martin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound, but it's too tight for my head
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chang

customer_reviews.title: badass bass headphones
customer_reviews.text: great headphones for lots of bass and great sound a lot louder sound than HA-M5x headphones ! ask me anything about headphones ?
customer_reviews.author: muddy

customer_reviews.title: A bit muddy
customer_reviews.text: I got quite a muddy sound for this, ended up returning them. Does have good bass, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ramone W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bit heavy and unconfortable, however it's a powerful and clean sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Bad bass.
customer_reviews.text: The bass did not meet my brother's expectations at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Booming Bass!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headsets more than my Dre Beats. I bought these to be a backup just in case I broke or lost my Beats, but once I put these bad boys on they became my primary headset. To me the bass in these headsets are a lot deeper than my Beats. Even at full blast there is no cracking or popping sound even though I do not recommend it as these headphones are ridiculously loud. I definitely got my money's worth. Should of got these instead of the Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Askaree

customer_reviews.title: Superb set!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the bomb!...Fantastic audio and with the large drivers, pure power as much as your ears can take!
customer_reviews.author: Mix Master E

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The plastic head band needs some padding, otherwise for the price, this is a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Singh
